duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead design team, internal and/or external engineers and architects to develop design concepts and constructability methods for client's data centers.
Ensure designs support concurrent maintenance activity requirements of data centers in a controlled and proven manner.
Collaborate with architects, engineers and consultants to ensure design concepts and product selection align with client's strategic goals.
Work with local jurisdictions to ensure all designs meet federal, state, and municipal requirements and building codes.
Represent Company at industry events by attending or speaking on current data center trends/topics.

skills.skill: PC Proficiency (Microsoft Office suite, AutoCAD or Visio)

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master’s preferred)
